2012.question: Translate the following sentences into English:
2012.prashna: निम्नलिखित वाक्यों का अंग्रेजी में अनुवाद करें:

sub_questions.b: राम और रहीम एक-दूसरे की मदद कर रहे हैं।
sub_questions.c: मेरा मित्र कल से बीमार है।
sub_questions.e: तुम्हारा गाँव यहाँ से कितनी दूर है?

anuprashna.b: राम और रहीम एक-दूसरे की मदद कर रहे हैं।
anuprashna.c: मेरा मित्र कल से बीमार है।
anuprashna.e: तुम्हारा गाँव यहाँ से कितनी दूर है?

2013.question: Name the poets who wrote the following lines:
2013.prashna: उन कवियों के नाम बताइए जिन्होंने निम्नलिखित पंक्तियाँ लिखी हैं:

sub_questions.a: Where are the songs of spring? Aye, where are they? Think not of them, thou hast thy music too.
sub_questions.b: O how feeble is man's power, That if good fortune fall. Cannot adde another houre, Nor a lost houre recall!
sub_questions.c: I celebrate myself, and sing myself, And what I assume you shall assume. For every atom belonging to me as good belongs to you.
sub_questions.d: Dead in hundreds at the back Follow wooden in our track, Arms raised stiffly to reprove In false attitudes of love.
sub_questions.e: If I should die, think only this for me; That there's some corner of a foreign field That is for ever England.

anuprashna.a: Where are the songs of spring? Aye, where are they? Think not of them, thou hast thy music too.
anuprashna.b: O how feeble is man's power, That if good fortune fall. Cannot adde another houre, Nor a lost houre recall!
anuprashna.c: I celebrate myself, and sing myself, And what I assume you shall assume. For every atom belonging to me as good belongs to you.
anuprashna.d: Dead in hundreds at the back Follow wooden in our track, Arms raised stiffly to reprove In false attitudes of love.
anuprashna.e: If I should die, think only this for me; That there's some corner of a foreign field That is for ever England.

2013.question: Name any five Indian English poets.
2013.prashna: किन्हीं पांच भारतीय अंग्रेजी कवियों के नाम बताइए।

2015.question: Name the authors of the following prose pieces:
2015.prashna: निम्नलिखित गद्य रचनाओं के लेखकों के नाम बताएँ:
